post:
SetupVPS.com - A Developer VPS provider, We provide it cheap, developer friendly & fast.
    You get 99.9% uptime and real support
    
    Upgrade, downgrade or cancel any-time. Love it.
    
    However we have some limitations:
    Only USA/CA customers
    
    We offer that mostly for students who need vps for there projects but low on cash

    Location: Chicago, Illinois
    Datacenter: Ubiquity Hosting
    Test IP: 173.234.60.93
